description: a Twitch player and browser Xtra for Twitch is a Twitch client focused on providing the best viewing and chatting experience on mobile devices: * Support for popular emotes with BetterTTV and FrankerFaceZ plugins * Watch VODs and clips with chat replay * Download VODs to watch offline * Continue watching outside of the app with Picture-in-Picture mode * Sleep timer to stop the stream automatically * Customizable interface with 3 different color themes
